headline.main: NAMING SECRETARY FOR AIR EXPECTED; Feeling Grows in Capital That Stimson Will Have New Aide to Push Production CORPS PROGRESS STRESSED Patterson Predicts Personnel of 54-Group Combat Force Will Be Near Goal by July

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 2 -- Belief is growing here that the President will soon appoint an Assistant Secretary of War for Aviation, to energize American airplane production in the same way that Lord Beaverbrook stepped up British airplane production.
abstract: Under-Sec Patterson on army air expansion progress
snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 2 -- Belief is growing here that the President will soon appoint an Assistant Secretary of War for Aviation, to energize American airplane production in the same way that Lord Beaverbrook stepped up British airplane production....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
